description: Initialize Express TypeScript project with basic configuration
acceptance_criteria: src/index.ts creates Express server on port 3001
npm run dev starts the server

description: Create in-memory Todo storage with CRUD operations
acceptance_criteria: Store has getAll(), getById(), create(), update(), delete() methods
GET /todos returns array of all todos
POST /todos creates new todo, returns 201 with todo
PUT /todos/:id updates todo, returns updated todo or 404

description: Create shared Todo type definition for frontend consumption
acceptance_criteria: Todo has: id (string), title (string), completed (boolean), createdAt (string), updatedAt (string)
shared/types.ts exports CreateTodoDto with just title
shared/types.ts exports UpdateTodoDto with optional title and completed
File is accessible from ../shared/types.ts for frontend
notes: IMPORTANT: This file will be consumed by frontend agent. Lock file before editing.
